name: Herley Motor Rider
description:
This 3D game is all free, just download and playing this 3D nice fantastic motor bikes racing game.
You like sports, and your passion is high speed on highway with super sports motor bikes, just play this game. This is very basic of sports motor bikes racing, rally game.
Racing, rally your sports super motor bikes with high speed, around highland and nice fantastic environment, doing some more thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your super sports motor bikes on racing highway is much funny and exciting. Just take your dream sports super motor bikes and start your racing.


How to play
This game is very easy to play, with some simple buttons. Just press gas button and speed up your dreams sports motor bikes on speed highway. You're a highway star.
There's a gas button, auto break and change view control buttons to play, that's much easy to play
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , rally super sports motor bikes
- Swing your device to control your super sports motor bikes steering
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally super sports motor bikes
- Camera button to change your view of racing , rally super sports motor bikes

Features:
- Amazing graphics of super sports motor bikes , highland fantastic environment
- Simple controls buttons with gas, auto break ones for racing, rally dream super sports motor bikes on highland fantastic environment
- Swing your device to control your super sports motor bikes
- Automatic controlling gear,break of your racing, rally sports super motor bikes
- Camera button to change your vision of racing , rally super sports motor bikes
